Name: Parma Violet Spritz
Ingredients: Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water
Instructions: POUR prosecco and liqueur into glass. ADD ice. TOP with soda.
Review: Inspired by and garnished with mini Parma Violet sweets, this spritz is flavoured with crème de violette liqueur.
History: Created in 2013 by yours truly for Jamie's Italian Bars. History of, and other recipes for, the Spritz family of cocktails
Garnish: Small pack of Parma Violet sweets
